name: European Wood Preservative Manufacturers Group
membership: European Institute for Wood Preservation WEI-IEO
goal:
The aim of the EWPM is to promote, with integrity, the correct use of wood preservatives including production, transportation, utilization and disposal, by all means including but not limited to:

taking any appropriate measures which are legal and are the decision of the voting members
â€¨
acting on behalf of members, to promote an agreed position in all technical, scientific, regulatory, health, safety and environmental protection domains which interest the industry, directly or indirectly, with particular regard to Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives: DIRECTIVE 2010/75/EU on industrial emissions (integrated pollution prevention and control), Regulation (EU) No 528/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 May 2012 concerning the making available on the market and use of biocidal products,  REGULATION (EU) No 305/2011 laying down harmonised conditions for the marketing of construction products
